title: How can personal magnetism and fluidification be used in hypnosis therapy?
first_phrase: In the last part of this text, the author delves deeper into the world of hypnosis, specifically non-verbal communication and hypnotism. The text begins with an exercise about approaching someone from different sides and observing their reactions. It then goes on to discuss magnetic passes, nerve nodes, plexuses, and equalization passes. The author also introduces the closure of the senses and technique of the 10 plexuses. The text concludes with the description and demonstration of the hypno-drama method. The author emphasizes the importance of being present and confident, as well as developing personal magnetism and using appropriate tones of voice to communicate effectively.
content: =================================================== Some hints to exercise on magnetic voice. 1 - BE PRESENT 2 - try to say "my name is ..." this a the tone of voice that your body is connected to the sense of "being sure" 3 - notice that when you tense the pelvic pavement the voice will be more sure (as hermetically you were drawing energy from the EARTH) ================================================== HYPNODRAMA METHOD 1: Mixed with non verbal hypnosis USE: to open the mind and evocate emotional reactions. It is a sort of CRISIS that the client see from the exterior. HISTORY: the first to develop this technique (the part with the two hands) has been the french psychologist Messinger. Exercise of the hypno-drama 1 - Have the person thinking to a problem 2 - induce the person with non verbal ways 3 - put him on the floor 4 - continue with the hypnodrama 5 - when catalepsy ends he can open his eyes How do you feel?
last_phrase: In conclusion, the techniques and exercises discussed in this text provide various ways to approach and work on different issues, such as magnetic voice, hypnotherapy, moving therapy, smoking cessation, allergy treatment, and self-discovery. It is essential to understand the principles of magnetism and to identify the type of activation of organs and personality to achieve better results. By incorporating techniques from hermeticism and quantum physics, one can explore the true and derivative symbolism and find a deeper understanding of the self. Practicing these techniques with present-mindedness and silence can lead to a deep trance that can promote healing and self-awareness.
